infos.value: Oh, it seems that we have received a gift from the villagers we helped earlier.
You have obtained a very valuable item. Please use it with great care.

When you receive items such as <color=#00ffff>Login Bonuses</color> or <color=#00ffff>Ranking Rewards</color>, you can obtain them from your <color=#00ffff>Present Box</color>. Be sure to check it often.
Proceed to a tutorial on Presents?
